–ú–æ–π –¥—Ä—É–≥-–∏–≥—Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª, —á—Ç–æ –µ—Å–ª–∏ —è –æ–ø—É–±–ª–∏–∫—É—é –æ—Ç–∑—ã–≤ –∏ –æ–Ω –Ω–∞–±–µ—Ä–µ—Ç 150 –ª–∞–π–∫–æ–≤ –∏ 50 –Ω–∞–≥—Ä–∞–¥, –æ–Ω –∫—É–ø–∏—Ç –º–Ω–µ —è—â–∏–∫ –ø–∏–≤–∞, –Ω–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤–æ–¥–∫–∏ –∏ 1 –∫–≥ –ª–∏–º–æ–Ω–∞, —Ç–∞–∫ —á—Ç–æ —è –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—é —ç—Ç–æ –∑–¥–µ—Å—å.

Positive review because it's very well made and it's free, but please, stay away. If you have an addictive personality, this game is not good for you. I've barely had it a week and I've only made it to Zone 33 at my highest, but I can already tell that I have to quit. It made me fuck up my sleep schedule every single day because I kept waiting for a speedminer upgrade so I get more Metal overnight. I wake up and instantly check it and spend way too much time on it when I have other shit to do. Every single portal I feel obligated to spend an hour or two micromanaging so I can get to the point where AFK-ing even makes sense, so to me it isn't even that idle. When I have it running, I'm alt tabbing every 30 seconds and trying to be efficient, I can't even focus on anything else despite it being idle. As I said, I've barely had it, but it's eating up so much of my time already I feel like a heroin addict and have to put it down early. None of these are faults with the game itself and it's why I'm not slapping a negative review, but if you're someone prone to get addicted to something like this, just don't even touch it.

An idle game that's truly idle.
No FOMO because there are no events or limited time items.
No clicking mechanic so no reason to set up an auto-clicker and leave a second computer running this game 24/7.
You COULD actively play and buy things as soon as you can afford to, but you really don't have to. Just save, close the program, play for 5 minutes when you get home. Even when you portal and reset your run, it only takes about 5 minutes to get to the point where you can be full idle again. After a couple of days, you unlock something that automatically expands your storage when you're offline, so there's not even a reason to log on every 20 minutes. Truly as great idle game for someone like me that has a need to constantly log back on to do things. It eliminates this drive for me.

That being said, this is entirely text based. If you like seeing animations and cool models and stuff, there is none of that here. The gameplay loop is pretty simple. But, if you're like me and you just like to see numbers going up over time, this is for you.

its like unlimited games but no games
but you get the games
its like unlimted bacon but no bacon
but you get the bacon.
it's like cookie clicker but with a more enjoyable late (i'm not even sure if this is late game at z183) game
the grind is long, but unlike other idle/incremental games, engaging and enjoyable. There are times where it gets boring, like when you get to the point when you need to run the same helium challenge about a dozen times. The features you unlock along the way mostly make up for this (z181< spoilers ahead) [spoiler] especially map at zone, autostructure, and autojobs. [/spoiler] 
The UI is obviously outdated and there is no music or sound effects to my knowledge, but that's part of the charm. Learn to code and mod it for all I care. You don't need a dripfeed of dopamine for every game on the market, it's free and came out before 2015. Plus it's open source. 

Masterpiece. Will likely play for another 2k hours and then never play it again.

Edit 2k hours later: Still playing. No end in sight. Must feed scruffy.
really fun game, free to play, literally busted as soon as the game opened.

excel if it was fun

if you like this game i recommend NGU idle also very nice game.

still a good time killer!
It's not the best game in the world but I keep coming back to it so I guess that's a recommendation in itself. :aceok:

TRIMPS TRIMPS WE ALL DO THE TRIMPING OUT HERE. TRIMPS THERE. TRIMPS HERE. THERE ARE TRIMPS EVERYWHERE AROUND YOU. THE TRIMPS CONSUME ALL. THEY WILL TRIMP ON YOU UNTIL YOU TRIMP. THATS WHEN YOU WILL FINALLY FALL TO THE TRIMP. SUFFCATION OF TRIMPS.
I like the funny little dudes that do everything and it's free =D

Trimps is one of the deepest incremental games to exist, with numerous approaches to progression, though it can take a while to let you in on the added gameplay. Really a layer cake of systemic design.

A text-based incremental idle game with a ridiculous amount of unique content. Automate old stuff as you unlock new stuff to keep things interesting for hours and hours, no spam clicking necessary! Trimps is everything you love about your favorite games, distilled to their purest form.

Incremental games have a very special charm, but many are quite shallow. One is different! Offers a surprising amount of depth and replayability. It's engaging, well-balanced, and keeps you hooked for hours with its clever mechanics. Highly recommended for idle game enthusiasts!
very fun, very grindy
based and trimp pilled
one of the best idler out there
Good Game, me like when number go up
theres a snimp in the pantry :(
